error.temporary_impossible_action: Temporary impossible action. Please try again later.
error.temporary_failure: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error.temporary_unavailable_infos: Unable to load information. Please try again later.
error.payment_failure: Payment failed. If the problem persists, contact your bank.

warning.regenerate_link: Regenerate the link? WARNING, THE OLD LINK WILL NO LONGER BE VALID.
warning.need_login_to_post_answer: To post an answer, you need to log in or create an account.
warning.need_login_to_post_comment: To post a comment, you need to log in or create an account.
warning.need_login_to_post_question: To ask a question, you need to log in or create an account.

info.six_digits_token_sent_to: Please enter the 6-digit code sent by email to the address {{email}}.
info.to_update_infos_write_to: To update certain information, you must write to us at the email address
info.precising_email_and_infos_to_update: specifying your email address and the information to be modified.
info.still_missing_details_to_receive_payment: We still lack some information for you to start selling your products.
info.missing_details_to_receive_payments: You must complete your information in order to start selling your products.
info.partner_with_stripe: Cocktailissimo uses Stripe for secure management of financial transactions.
info.can_regenerate_shop_link: The current name of your business is different from that on the shop link. To remedy this, you can regenerate the link. WARNING, the old link will no longer be valid.
info.processing_payment: Payment in progress... Please stay on this page
info.shop_will_be_open_soon: Excited to see our products ? Very soon, discover the gems we have selected for you... In the meantime, try our delicious cocktail recipes.

success.link_regenerated: The link has been successfully regenerated!
success.contact_message_sent: Thank you for your message! We will respond to you as soon as possible.

submit.question: Thank you for asking your question! You will receive an email notification as soon as someone answers.
submit.review: Thank you for giving your opinion! It will be published in a few days (after moderation).

ask.become_vendor: Do you want to become a vendor?
ask.why_become_vendor: Why do you want to sell your products on Cocktailissimo?

count.product_views_zero: The product has not been viewed yet.
count.product_views_one: The product has been viewed only once so far.
count.product_views_other: The product has been viewed {{count}} times.
count.product_carts_zero: The product has not been added to any cart yet.
count.product_carts_one: The product has been added to only one cart so far.
count.product_carts_other: The product has been added to {{count}} carts.
count.product_sales_zero: The product has not been purchased yet.
count.product_sales_one: The product has been purchased only once so far.
count.product_sales_other: The product has been purchased {{count}} times.

submit.first_review: I am posting the first review

agree_contacts: I agree to be contacted by Cocktailissimo

question: Question
secure_payment_explanation: To ensure maximum security, financial transactions are processed by our partner Stripe, a leader in payment solutions. Your data is encrypted, ensuring absolute confidentiality throughout the transaction.
talk_us_about_you: Tell us a bit about yourself
header_pub: Welcome to Cocktailissimo! The store will be open soon... In the meantime, try our delicious cocktail recipes. Cheers!
